body:
The current versions of bazel do have a leading zero - mine is '0.5.2-homebrew'.

I know what you mean though - In the past I have solved this problem by converting X.Y.Z into X.YZ, where Y and Z are formatted %04u.  

I'm not really trying to solve that problem though.  I could raise an issue for that if you would like.

body_text:
The current versions of bazel do have a leading zero - mine is '0.5.2-homebrew'.
I know what you mean though - In the past I have solved this problem by converting X.Y.Z into X.YZ, where Y and Z are formatted %04u.
I'm not really trying to solve that problem though.  I could raise an issue for that if you would like.
